select.id: getスケジュール履歴情報初期_送付

mapper.select: SELECT TAB.* FROM rgdb."DbT3104KokuhorenInterfaceKanri" as TAB WHERE TAB."sofuTorikomiKubun" = '1' AND TAB."shoriYM" = ( SELECT MAX(TempTAB."shoriYM") FROM rgdb."DbT3104KokuhorenInterfaceKanri" AS TempTAB WHERE TempTAB."sofuTorikomiKubun" = '1')

select.id: getスケジュール履歴情報初期_取込

mapper.select: SELECT TAB.* FROM rgdb."DbT3104KokuhorenInterfaceKanri" as TAB WHERE TAB."sofuTorikomiKubun" = '2' AND TAB."shoriYM" = ( SELECT MAX(TempTAB."shoriYM") FROM rgdb."DbT3104KokuhorenInterfaceKanri" AS TempTAB WHERE TempTAB."sofuTorikomiKubun" = '2')
